title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Examples of many body systems, second quantization, electron-phonon interaction, spin systems, photons. Green s function at zero temperature: Smatrix, Wick s theorem, Feynman diagram, Dyson s eqn., phonon and photon Green s function. Green s function at finite temperature: Imaginary time Green s function, Matsubara formalism, frequency summation, linked cluster expansion, analytic continuation. Applications: electrons in the presence of impurities , linear response, Kubo formulae, correlation functions. Electron gas, KE, direct Coulomb , exchange, screening, Thomas-Fermi theory, RPA. Exactly solvable models, T-matrix, Friedel sum rule, phase shift. Electron-phonon interaction, superconductivity, liquid Helium.
